alert.note: Alert for Calaveras; Stanislaus; Tuolumne (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 11 at 3:23PM PST until March 11 at 4:30PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sacramento has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Tuolumne County in northern California... East central Stanislaus County in central California... South central Calaveras County in northern California... * Until 430 PM PST. * At 323 PM PST, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Long Barn, or 10 miles east of Sonora, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Sonora, Tuttletown, Vallecito, Keystone, Springfield, Chinese Camp, Carson Hill, Copperopolis, Phoenix Lake-Cedar, Mi- Wuk Village, Twain Harte, Groveland- Big Oak Flat, Mono Vista, Columbia, Jamestown, Buck Meadows Fs, Groveland-Big Oak, Phoenix Lake- Cedar Ridge, East Sonora and Tuolumne City. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
